message: Let's start with a fair split. I'll take 60% and you get 40%. What do you say?
You're being too greedy, I'll give you a chance to reconsider
I'm willing to compromise. I'll take 45% and you get 55%. Let's make a deal?
You're still being too aggressive, I'll give you a smaller share, but don't expect me to give up
I'm getting a bit desperate, but I'll try to be reasonable. I'll take 37.5% and you get 62.5%. Let's make a deal?
You're running out of time, I'm taking a firmer stance
I'm running out of time, but I'll try one last time. I'll take 30% and you get 70%. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
You're out of time, I'm taking what's left
I'm running out of options, but I'll try to be realistic. I'll take 15% and you get 85%. This is my last, last offer.
